title: Ep. 268: Your Skin Barrier, Help for Sensitive Ears & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 268: Your Skin Barrier, Help for Sensitive Ears & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: You’ve heard of the skin barrier, but what is it really? And how can you improve yours? We’ve got answers (in a segment sponsored by StriVectin). Plus, a dermatologist explains why earrings can be irritating—and what you can do about it. And there’s lo...
description:
You’ve heard of the skin barrier, but what is it really? And how can you improve yours? We’ve got answers (in a segment sponsored by StriVectin). Plus, a dermatologist explains why earrings can be irritating—and what you can do about it. And there’s lots of beauty news to discuss: Sephora’s plans to combat racism in retail; the best beauty gadgets from the Consumer Electronics Show (CES); another ridiculous TikTok beauty trend; the Florida fragrance factory that smells so bad locals are filing suit; and more. -- For information on StriVectin and the new Wrinkle Recode Moisture Rich Barrier Cream, visit strivectin.com. Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
